data.question: What is the primary application of multi-component metalâ€“organic frameworks (MOFs)?
data.answer: Gas adsorption, separation, cooperative catalysis, and biomimetics.

data.question: What strategy was used to synthesize mixed-component RE-MOFs?
Why are rare-earth (RE)-metal-based clusters suitable for developing MOFs with multiple metal sites?
data.answer: Because of the chemical similarity of RE elements, different RE metals tend to form similar SBUs and isostructural MOFs, providing additional tunability.

data.question: What was the role of DCDPS in the synthesis of PCN-900(Eu)?
data.answer: DCDPS acted as an auxiliary linker that bridges the coordinatively unsaturated RE to fulfill the 12-connected nodes.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of MOFs based on RE6 and TCPP was successful.
What happens to the Eu-DCDPS bond in PCN-900(Eu)?
data.answer: The Eu-DCDPS junction is severely twisted with the carboxylate bent 49 degrees away from its normal position.

data.question: Can the bent DCDPS linker in PCN-900(Eu) be replaced by other linear linkers?
data.answer: Yes, the bent DCDPS linker can be replaced by linear linkers such as BPDC and its derivatives to form a series of functionalized MOFs.

data.question: What is the BET surface area of PCN-900(Eu)-NiTCPP?
True or False: PCN-900(RE) series show excellent thermal stability.
What reaction was used to evaluate the catalytic performance of PCN-900 series?
data.answer: The cycloaddition of CO2 and epoxides.

data.question: True or False: PCN-900(Eu)-CoTCPP-CoBPYDC shows the highest conversion rate in the cycloaddition of CO2 with epoxides among the tested MOFs.
What is the conversion rate of PCN-900(Eu)-CoTCPP-CoBPYDC in the cycloaddition of CO2 with epoxides?
How does the pore size of Eu9-CoTCPP compare to PCN-900(Eu)-CoTCPP-CoBPYDC?
data.answer: Eu9-CoTCPP has a much smaller pore size than PCN-900(Eu)-CoTCPP-CoBPYDC.

data.question: True or False: The physical mixture of Eu6-CoBPYDC and Eu9-CoTCPP shows higher conversion than PCN-900(Eu)-CoTCPP-CoBPYDC.
What is the role of cobalt in the cycloaddition reactions of CO2 with epoxides?
data.answer: Cobalt plays an important role as it is part of the active sites that catalyze the reaction.

data.question: True or False: PCN-900(Eu)-CoTCPP-CoBPYDC maintains its catalytic activity and crystallinity after three catalysis cycles.
What is the free volume of PCN-900(Eu) based on the calculation by PLATON software?
True or False: The synthesis of PCN-900(Eu) using BPDC as an auxiliary linker was successful.
What is the significance of the unusual bond angle in the Eu-DCDPS junction within PCN-900(Eu)?
data.answer: The unusual bond angle may destabilize the binding between the DCDPS and the framework and can be changed by other linear linkers with suitable lengths.

data.question: True or False: The PCN-900(RE) series demonstrates high tunability of both metal and linker components.
